entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
